Class EnquiryManager

java.lang.Object
controller.enquiry.EnquiryManager
public class EnquiryManager extends Object
Manages enquiries, providing functionalities to create, retrieve, update, delete, and answer enquiries. Interacts with the EnquiryRepository for data persistence.

  • Method Details

    • createNewEnquiry

      public static void createNewEnquiry(String enquiryID, String enquiryTitle, String creatorID, String content, String answer, Boolean answered) throws ModelAlreadyExistsException
      Creates a new enquiry with a specified ID.
      Parameters:
      enquiryID - The unique ID for the new enquiry.
      enquiryTitle - The title of the enquiry.
      creatorID - The ID of the user creating the enquiry.
      content - The content/question of the enquiry.
      answer - The initial answer (can be null).
      answered - The initial answered status.
      Throws:
      ModelAlreadyExistsException - If an enquiry with the same ID already exists.

    • createNewEnquiry

      public static String createNewEnquiry(String enquiryTitle, String creatorID, String content, String answer, Boolean answered) throws ModelAlreadyExistsException
      Creates a new enquiry, automatically generating a unique ID.
      Parameters:
      enquiryTitle - The title of the enquiry.
      creatorID - The ID of the user creating the enquiry.
      content - The content/question of the enquiry.
      answer - The initial answer (can be null).
      answered - The initial answered status.
      Returns:
      The generated unique ID for the newly created enquiry.
      Throws:
      ModelAlreadyExistsException - If the generated ID somehow already exists (should be rare).

    • getEnquiryByID

      public static Enquiry getEnquiryByID(String enquiryID) throws ModelNotFoundException
      Retrieves an enquiry by its unique ID.
      Parameters:
      enquiryID - The ID of the enquiry to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The Enquiry object.
      Throws:
      ModelNotFoundException - If no enquiry with the specified ID is found.

    • getNewEnquiryID

      public static String getNewEnquiryID()
      Generates a new unique ID for an enquiry. The ID is generated by finding the highest existing ID (e.g., "E1", "E2") and incrementing the number. Starts with "E1" if the repository is empty.
      Returns:
      A new unique enquiry ID string (e.g., "E3").

    • updateEnquiry

      public static void updateEnquiry(String enquiryID, String question, String answer) throws ModelNotFoundException
      Updates the question and answer of an existing enquiry.
      Parameters:
      enquiryID - The ID of the enquiry to update.
      question - The new question/content for the enquiry.
      answer - The new answer for the enquiry.
      Throws:
      ModelNotFoundException - If no enquiry with the specified ID is found.

    • deleteEnquiry

      public static void deleteEnquiry(String enquiryID) throws ModelNotFoundException
      Deletes an enquiry from the repository.
      Parameters:
      enquiryID - The ID of the enquiry to delete.
      Throws:
      ModelNotFoundException - If no enquiry with the specified ID is found.

    • answerEnquiry

      public static void answerEnquiry(String enquiryID, String answer) throws ModelNotFoundException
      Sets the answer for a specific enquiry and marks it as answered.
      Parameters:
      enquiryID - The ID of the enquiry to answer.
      answer - The answer text.
      Throws:
      ModelNotFoundException - If no enquiry with the specified ID is found.

    • getAllEnquiries

      public static List<Enquiry> getAllEnquiries()
      Retrieves a list of all enquiries from the repository.
      Returns:
      A list containing all Enquiry objects.

    • getAnsweredEnquiries

      public static List<Enquiry> getAnsweredEnquiries()
      Retrieves all enquiries that have been answered.
      Returns:
      List of answered Enquiry objects.

    • getUnansweredEnquiries

      public static List<Enquiry> getUnansweredEnquiries()
      Retrieves all enquiries that have not been answered.
      Returns:
      List of unanswered Enquiry objects.
